metadata.title: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: Understand how Inteli selects leaders capable of uniting management, AI and Data, and why the rigor of the process is the basis of the value of our MBA.

content_blocks.text: Inteli>Artificial Intelligence>Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students

content_blocks.text:
Inteli>Artificial Intelligence>Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students

- Victor Machado

content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students

content_blocks.text: Senior leaders' biggest frustration with traditional MBAs isn't the content. It's the class. The fear of investing time and money only to be leveled down in generic discussions is real. In an elite program, who sits next to you is not a detail. It's the core of the value proposition.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students

content_blocks.text: That's whyMBA in AI and Data for Business at Intelithe selection process is not an obstacle. It's our main guarantee of quality and the program's most importantfeature. We're not just filling vacancies; we're curating an ecosystem of leaders.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students

content_blocks.text: What we're really looking for (and it's not just your CV)
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: What we're really looking for (and it's not just your CV)

content_blocks.text: Your CV and years of experience open the door. What guarantees your place at the table is what goes beyond it. We're looking for leaders with:
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: What we're really looking for (and it's not just your CV)

content_blocks.text:
Your CV and years of experience open the door. What guarantees your place at the table is what goes beyond it. We're looking for leaders with:

- Focus on Practical Application:At the interview stage, our focus is on understanding "how you plan to apply the knowledge". We're looking for leaders who don't come to "attend" classes, but to solve real challenges. We want to know what strategic AI and Data problem you are trying to solve in your company.
- Impact Potential (Management + AI):The Curriculum Structure of our MBA is a robust bridge between Business, Leadership and Applied Technology. That's why we're not looking for the pure technical specialist, nor the manager who doesn't understand technology. We are looking for the "translator" leader: the one capable of navigating the intersection between the technology team and the companyboard.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: What we're really looking for (and it's not just your CV)

content_blocks.text: Rigor as a guarantee of ROI
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: Rigor as a guarantee of ROI

content_blocks.text: Our rigorous selection is your greatest guarantee of ROI.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: Rigor as a guarantee of ROI

content_blocks.text: It guarantees that you will be in an environment where professionals from different areas debate the feasibility of amachine learningproject or discussdata-drivenstrategies. This curation is the foundation that allows the program to deliver its maximum value. Inteli's MBA in AI and Data for Businessis not for everyone. And that's our promise.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: Rigor as a guarantee of ROI

content_blocks.text: Get to know the pillars of our selection process and find out if your profile matches our vision of leadership. Access the announcement and the complete structure on our website.
content_blocks.section: Inside the Inteli MBA Application Process: what we look for in our students
content_blocks.subsection: Rigor as a guarantee of ROI
